_header: Now Holy Ghost of the High Deity
Subjects: prayers, to Holy Ghost; Holy Ghost, prayers to
_description: Hoccleve’s ‘Inuocacio ad spiritum sanctum’ — ten stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM744.First Lines:
Now holy goost of the hy deiteeLoue and holy
                    communicacioun…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…Our soules hem to haue in gouernanceO Trinitee haue vs in
                    remembrance
